Articles.Content: So I completely forgot that the Kraken attack on the forums ate all my stuff, and I never re-introduced myself. Not that im expecting anyone to really care who I am . I'm pretty mediocre when it comes to the game probably, but I'd like to think I'm decent. Currently redesigning a lot of my ships/probes for 0.21 since I like to start with fresh installs, got a probe on the easy stuff so far [Mun, Duna, and Eve] working on Dres next because why not. I've thought about streaming before but I'm fairly sure no one would want to watch me be terrible
Thank you! And yes it was...I had just started posting more and then bam. Kinda forgot to keep posting after that
